articles.title: 51 Hours of Fury: Bonin family sees both sides when White Bear Lake takes on Hill-Murray - Star Tribune
articles.description: Son Brendan is a senior forward for the Hill-Murray Pioneers. Dad Brian ranks as a legend for the White Bear Lake Bears ("My team," he says.) The schools meet tonight in the Section 4AA final.

articles.title: Five observations: Examining what led to the Warriors' loss in Dallas - The Athletic
articles.description: The Mavericks (and Luka Doncic) got off to a roaring start, and the Warriors faded late after tying the score, leading to the loss.
articles.content: DALLAS — Here are five observations from the Warriors’ 122-113 road loss to the Mavericks on Thursday night, which dropped them to an ugly 2-7 over their past nine games.1. What caused the loss early… [+1225 chars]
